trans-unit.target: 版本信息

trans-unit.source: Base directory
trans-unit.target: 基本目录

trans-unit.source: Absolute path to where ViMP is installed (often called webroot)

trans-unit.target: 服务器组

trans-unit.source: Default language
trans-unit.target: 预设语言

trans-unit.source: Sets the default language of the portal (default: @default)
trans-unit.target: 设置门户网站的默认语言（默认：默认）

trans-unit.source: Maximum upload filesize
trans-unit.target: 最大上传文件大小

trans-unit.source: Value (in bytes) that limits file uploads (make sure to adjust php.ini as well)
trans-unit.target: 值（以字节为单位），限制上传文件（确保调整php.ini以及）

trans-unit.source: Temporary upload directory
trans-unit.target: 临时上传目录

trans-unit.source: Specify here which temporary directory is used for http post uploads
trans-unit.target: 在这里指定使用HTTP POST上传临时目录

trans-unit.source: This sets the maximum number of media items within a RSS feed
trans-unit.target: 这台内媒体项目的最大数量的RSS提要

trans-unit.source: Allowed e-mail domains
trans-unit.target: 允许电子邮件域

trans-unit.source: Approve e-mail addresses not matching the allowed domains
trans-unit.target: 批准发送邮件地址不匹配允许的域

trans-unit.source: Internal cache directory
trans-unit.target: 内部缓存目录

trans-unit.target: 内部缓存目录的相对位置

trans-unit.source: Total number of results in autocomplete fields
trans-unit.target: 在自动完成字段总数结果

trans-unit.source: Media
trans-unit.target: 媒体

trans-unit.source: Enable videos
trans-unit.target: 启用视频

trans-unit.source: If set to true, videos can be uploaded in the portal
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，视频可以上传在门户网站

trans-unit.source: Enable photos
trans-unit.target: 启用照片

trans-unit.source: If set to true, photos can be uploaded in the portal
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，照片可以上传在门户网站

trans-unit.source: Enable audio files
trans-unit.target: 启用音频文件

trans-unit.source: If set to true, audio files can be uploaded in the portal
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，音频文件，可以在门户网站上载

trans-unit.source: Activate comments
trans-unit.target: 激活的意见

trans-unit.source: If set to true, users can comment media
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，用户可以评论媒体

trans-unit.source: Allow rating
trans-unit.target: 允许评级

trans-unit.source: Verify new media
trans-unit.target: 验证新媒体

trans-unit.source: If this value is set to true, all the new media must first be approved by an administrator
trans-unit.target: 如果这个值设置为true，所有的新媒体必须首先由管理员批准

trans-unit.source: Featured media type
trans-unit.target: 功能的媒体类型

trans-unit.source: This defines the way featured media is selected for the homepage
trans-unit.target: 这个定义的功能的媒体是网页选择的方式

trans-unit.source: Featured medium
trans-unit.target: 特色介质

trans-unit.source: If you have chosen "single medium" in the "Featured media type" option you can define that medium with this option
trans-unit.target: 如果您选择了“单一介质”，在“功能的媒体类型”选项，您可以定义此选项中。

trans-unit.source: Default width of the ViMP media player
trans-unit.target: ViMP媒体播放器的默认宽度

trans-unit.source: This sets the default width of the media player (in pixel)
trans-unit.target: 这台媒体播放器的默认宽度（像素）

trans-unit.source: Default height of the ViMP media player
trans-unit.target: ViMP媒体播放器的默认高度

trans-unit.source: This sets the default height of the media player (in pixel)
trans-unit.target: 这台媒体播放器的默认高度（像素）

trans-unit.source: Minimum value for ratings
trans-unit.target: 为收视率的最低值

trans-unit.source: (default: @default)
trans-unit.target: （默认：默认）

trans-unit.source: Maximum value for ratings
trans-unit.target: 为收视率的最大价值

trans-unit.source: Rating step size
trans-unit.target: 评级步长

trans-unit.source: The step for ratings (default: @default)
trans-unit.target: 对收视率的步骤（默认：@默认）

trans-unit.source: Time limit for medium visit count
trans-unit.target: 介质访问计数的时间限制

trans-unit.source: This sets the number of seconds, during which visits to a medium by the same user won't be counted (default: @default = every visit counts)
trans-unit.target: 这集的秒数，在此期间，由同一个用户访问一个中等不会被计算（默认：@default =每次访问计数）

trans-unit.source: List of allowed video extensions
trans-unit.target: 允许视频扩展名单

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple extensions with a comma
trans-unit.target: 用逗号分隔多个扩展

trans-unit.source: List of allowed photo extensions
trans-unit.target: 允许的照片扩展名单

trans-unit.source: List of allowed audio file extensions
trans-unit.target: 允许音频文件扩展名列表

trans-unit.source: User
trans-unit.target: 用户

trans-unit.source: Users
trans-unit.target: 用户

trans-unit.source: Verify registered users
trans-unit.target: 验证注册用户

trans-unit.source: If set to true, new users have to be verified by an administrator
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，新用户都必须由管理员核实

trans-unit.source: Log in user after registration
trans-unit.target: 用户在注册后登录

trans-unit.source: If set to true, each new user will be automatically logged in after registration
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，每个新用户将被自动记录在登记后

trans-unit.source: Send friend requests by e-mail
trans-unit.target: 通过电子邮件发送好友请求

trans-unit.source: If set to true, an additional friend request by e-mail will be sent (otherwise only a private message is sent on the portal)
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，一个额外的朋友通过e - mail请求将被发送（否则只有悄悄话门户网站发送）

trans-unit.source: Minimum length of a username
trans-unit.target: 最小长度的用户名

trans-unit.source: This sets the minimum number of characters for valid usernames
trans-unit.target: 这为有效的用户名的最少字符数

trans-unit.source: Maximum length of a username
trans-unit.target: 用户名的最大长度

trans-unit.source: This sets the maximum number of characters for valid usernames
trans-unit.target: 这为有效的用户名的最大字符数

trans-unit.source: Minimum password length
trans-unit.target: 密码长度最小值

trans-unit.source: This sets the minimum number of characters for valid passwords
trans-unit.target: 这为有效密码的最少字符数

trans-unit.source: Maximum password length
trans-unit.target: 密码最大长度

trans-unit.source: This sets the maximum number of characters for valid passwords
trans-unit.target: 这为有效密码的最大字符数

trans-unit.source: Time limit for user visit count
trans-unit.target: 用户访问计数的时间限制

trans-unit.source: This sets the number of seconds, during which visits to a profile by the same user won't be counted (default: @default = every visit counts)
trans-unit.target: 这集的秒数，由同一个用户配置文件的访问，其间将不被计算（默认：默认值=每次访问计数）

trans-unit.source: User online timeout
trans-unit.target: 用户连接超时

trans-unit.source: Defines for how long after the last page view a user will be shown as online (in seconds, default: @default)
trans-unit.target: 定义后多久的最后一页查看用户将显示为在线（以秒计，默认：@default）

trans-unit.source: "New user" Timeout
trans-unit.target: “新用户”超时

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long a user after registration appears to be new (in seconds, default: @default)
trans-unit.target: 指定多久后，注册用户似乎是新的（以秒计，默认：@默认）

trans-unit.source: Invitiations expire after X days
trans-unit.target: Invitiations到期后X天

trans-unit.source: Set the number of days after which invitation requests expire
trans-unit.target: 设置邀请请求到期的天数后，

trans-unit.source: E-mail
Mail type
trans-unit.target: 邮件类型

trans-unit.source: This defines the mailer used to send e-mails.
trans-unit.target: 这定义用于发送电子邮件的邮件。

trans-unit.source: Mail SMTP server
trans-unit.target: 邮件的SMTP服务器

trans-unit.source: If mail type is set to SMTP, specify the (external) SMTP server here
trans-unit.target: 如果邮件类型设置为SMTP，指定（外部）的SMTP服务器

trans-unit.source: Mail SMTP Port
trans-unit.target: 邮件SMTP端口

trans-unit.source: If mail type is set to SMTP the external SMTP port are specified here
trans-unit.target: 如果邮件类型是外部SMTP端口设置为SMTP此处指定

trans-unit.source: Mail SMTP user
trans-unit.target: 邮件的SMTP用户

trans-unit.source: If mail type is set to SMTP enter the SMTP username here
trans-unit.target: 如果邮件类型设置为SMTP输入SMTP用户名

trans-unit.source: Mail SMTP password
trans-unit.target: 邮件SMTP密码

trans-unit.source: If mail type is set to SMTP enter the SMTP password here
trans-unit.target: 如果邮件类型设置为SMTP输入SMTP密码

trans-unit.source: Mail SMTP POP authentication
trans-unit.target: 邮件的SMTP POP验证

trans-unit.source: If your SMTP server requires POP authentication, enable this setting
trans-unit.target: 如果您的SMTP服务器需要POP验证，启用此设置

trans-unit.source: Mail POP server
trans-unit.target: 邮件的POP服务器

trans-unit.source: Set the POP server if your SMTP server requires POP authentication
trans-unit.target: 如果您的SMTP服务器需要POP验证，设置POP服务器

trans-unit.source: Send e-mail notification on new private messages
trans-unit.target: 在新的私人讯息发送电子邮件通知

trans-unit.target: 门户网站

trans-unit.source: Web address
trans-unit.target: 网站地址

trans-unit.source: This is the URL to your portal
trans-unit.target: 这是您的门户网站的网址

trans-unit.source: Portal name
trans-unit.target: 门户网站的名称

trans-unit.source: This is the name of your portal

trans-unit.target: 门户网站标题

trans-unit.source: This is the name of the portal that will be displayed in the browser's title bar and inserted into the META tags of the HTML
trans-unit.target: 这是门户网站的名称将显示在浏览器的标题栏和插入的HTML META标签

trans-unit.source: Portal description
trans-unit.target: 门户网站的介绍

trans-unit.source: This is the description of the portal that will be inserted into the META tags of the HTML
trans-unit.target: 这是门户网站的描述，将插入到HTML的META标签

trans-unit.source: Portal keywords

trans-unit.source: These are the keywords of the portal that will be inserted into the META tags of the HTML
trans-unit.target: 这些门户将插入到HTML的META标签的关键字

trans-unit.source: Portal e-mail address
trans-unit.target: 门户网站E - mail地址

trans-unit.source: This is the e-mail address that is set as the sender address for outgoing e-mails (e.g. registration e-mails)

trans-unit.target: 版权声明

trans-unit.source: This notice will be displayed within the RSS feed

trans-unit.source: WebTV
trans-unit.target: 网络电视

trans-unit.source: WebTV mode
trans-unit.target: 网络电视模式

trans-unit.source: Select the active areas of the portal. "WebTV only": All parts of the portal except WebTV are available for administrators and moderators only. Users can still register unless this function is also disabled. "Community only" deactivates the WebTV mode completely
trans-unit.target: 选择门户网站的活跃的地区。 “网络电视只有”：除了网络电视门户网站的所有部分都仅管理员和版主。用户仍然可以注册，除非这个功能也被禁用。 “社区”，完全取消了WebTV模式

trans-unit.target: 在网络电视模式下的功能的媒体类型

trans-unit.source: This defines the way featured media is selected in WebTV mode
trans-unit.target: 这定义功能的媒体网络电视模式选择的方式

trans-unit.source: Featured medium in WebTV mode
trans-unit.target: 推荐中型网络电视模式

trans-unit.source: If you have chosen "single medium" in the "Featured media type in WebTV mode" option you can define that medium with this option

trans-unit.source: Enable ColorMood

trans-unit.target: ColorMood让视频体验更舒适，改变背景颜色，根据视频中的颜色
